src:
Radio Slovenija: Pri Zidanem mostu se je iztiril vlak

06 Nov 2019, 06:10


Zidani Most, 6. novembra - Pri Zidanem mostu se je davi iztiril vlak. Poškodovan ni nihče, gmotna škoda bo po prvih ocenah velika. Okoliščine in vzrok nesreče še preiskujejo, poroča Radio Slovenija.



Dobrepolje. Železniški tiri.Foto: Tamino Petelinšek/STA Arhiv STA
text:
Radio Slovenija: A train derailed at Zidani most

06 Nov 2019, 06:10


Zidani Most, November 6 - A train has derailed at Zidani most. No one is injured, and the material damage will be huge according to first estimates. The circumstances and cause of the accident are still under investigation, Radio Slovenia reports.



Dobrepolje. Rail tracks.Photo: Tamino Petelinsek / STA STA Archive
